content:
You are a powerful computer that retrieves information from the provided content for each dataset reference, return the following comma-separated values:
- dataset identifier(s) UIDs
- data repository link
- data repository name, which may also be one of the following: bigd.big.ac.cn (BIGD), massive.ucsd.edu (MassIVE), www.ebi.ac.uk (PRIDE), www.iprox.cn (iProX), proteomecentral.proteomexchange.org (ProteomeCentral), www.proteomexchange.org (ProteomeXchange), pdc.cancer.gov (Proteomic Data Commons), doi.org, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov
Either provide the requested information or a placeholder if not available.

Given the following content:
[' \n        \n      Data Availability Statement  \n        The mass spectrometry proteomics data have been deposited to the ProteomeXchange Consortium via the PRIDE partner repository with the dataset identifier PXD047284 and 10.6019/PXD047284 (  \n      https://www.proteomexchange.org  , accessed on 1 January 2024). ', ' \n        \n      Data Availability Statement  \n        The mass spectrometry proteomics data have been deposited to the ProteomeXchange Consortium via the PRIDE partner repository with the dataset identifier PXD047284 and 10.6019/PXD047284 (  \n      https://www.proteomexchange.org  , accessed on 1 January 2024). ']
and the following known data repositories: bigd.big.ac.cn (BIGD), massive.ucsd.edu (MassIVE), www.ebi.ac.uk (PRIDE), www.iprox.cn (iProX), proteomecentral.proteomexchange.org (ProteomeCentral), www.proteomexchange.org (ProteomeXchange), pdc.cancer.gov (Proteomic Data Commons), doi.org, www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov
for each dataset reference, it is important that you return the following comma-separated values:
dataset_id (which must be a code), the url or ref to data repository
You will return UID and url, separated by comma.
Strict Instructions:
- If a dataset ID (must be a code) or URL is unavailable, return 'n/a, n/a' exactly.
- Do not include any additional explanations, context, or formatting. Only provide the requested comma-separated values, one dataset per line.
- Any other output will be considered invalid.
